panels.title: SLI01: Percentage of time instant query requests to Thanos

panels.description: Error rate for Instant query requests to thanos-query should be below 10.0%

* Sample interval is 1m 
* Request selectors are job=\~"thanos-query" , handler="query" 
* Error selectors are code=\~"4..|5.."
panels.title: Requests, errors, and error rate - Instant query requests to thanos-query
SLI02: Percentage of time instant query requests to Thanos are fast enough

panels.description: Request latency for Instant query requests to thanos-query should be below 15.0s for the 80th percentile

* Sample interval is 1m 
* Request selectors are job=\~"thanos-query" , handler="query"
panels.title: Latency - Instant query requests to thanos-query
SLI03: Percentage of time range query requests to Thanos

panels.description: Error rate for Range query requests to thanos-query should be below 10.0%

* Sample interval is 1m 
* Request selectors are job=\~"thanos-query" , handler="query_range" 
* Error selectors are code=\~"4..|5.."
panels.title: Requests, errors, and error rate - Range query requests to thanos-query
SLI04: Percentage of time range query requests to Thanos are fast enough

panels.description: Request latency for Range query requests to thanos-query should be below 10.0s for the 80th percentile

* Sample interval is 1m 
* Request selectors are job=\~"thanos-query" , handler="query_range"
panels.title: Latency - Range query requests to thanos-query
SLI05: Percentage of time compactions by thanos-compact

panels.description: the rate of Thanos-compact operations and failures should be below 1.0%
